query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
    PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
    PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>
            SELECT DISTINCT ?membership ?person ?person_uri ?person_gender ?person_genderUri 
            where {{?person_uri org:hasMembership ?membership_uri;
                                vcard:hasGender ?person_genderUri;
                                foaf:name ?person.
                    ?membership_uri euvoc:positionComplement ?membership.
                    ?person_genderUri skos:prefLabel ?person_gender.
                    } 
                   filter(?membership_uri=<PARAMETER>)
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?membership), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?person_gender), "en")).
                   }ORDER BY ?person
                   #LIMIT 50

PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX geo: <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#>
PREFIX geosparql: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?opTheme ?opTheme_uri ?corporateBodyType ?corporateBodyType_uri ?corporateBodyType_definition ?corporateBody ?corporateBody_uri (group_concat(distinct ?corporateBody_locationTemp;separator=';') as ?corporateBody_location) ?corporateBody_homepage (group_concat(distinct STR(?corporateBody_telephoneTemp);separator=';') as ?corporateBody_telephone) (?opTheme_uri AS ?corporateBody_opTheme)
where {{?publicationDocument_uri cdm:publication_general_is_about_concept_op_theme ?opTheme_uri;
cdm:work_authored_by_agent ?corporateBody_uri.
?opTheme_uri skos:prefLabel ?opTheme.
?corporateBody_uri skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody.
?corporateBody_uri dcterms:type ?corporateBodyType_uri.
?corporateBodyType_uri skos:prefLabel ?corporateBodyType;
skos:definition ?corporateBodyType_definition.
OPTIONAL{
        ?corporateBody_uri geo:location ?corporateBody_locationTempURI.
        ?corporateBody_locationTempURI skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody_cityTemp;
        geosparql:sfWithin ?corporateBody_countryTempURI.
        ?corporateBody_countryTempURI skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody_countryTemp.
        BIND(CONCAT(STR(?corporateBody_cityTemp),"-",STR(?corporateBody_countryTemp)) AS ?corporateBody_locationTemp).
        FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody_cityTemp), "en")).
        FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody_countryTemp), "en")).
}
OPTIONAL{
    ?corporateBody_uri foaf:homepage ?corporateBody_homepage.
}
OPTIONAL{
    ?corporateBody_uri vcard:hasTelephone ?bnode.
    ?bnode vcard:hasValue ?corporateBody_telephoneTemp.
}
}
filter(?opTheme_uri=<PARAMETER>)
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody), "en")).
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBodyType), "en")).
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?opTheme), "en")).
}ORDER BY ?opTheme ?corporateBodyType ?corporateBody
option_text: This is the long explanation of OP Themes and publication author

query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?det ?det_uri ?detLevel1 ?detLevel1_uri ?detLevel2 ?detLevel2_uri
where {{ ?det_uri skos:prefLabel ?det;
skos:hasTopConcept ?detLevel1_uri.
?detLevel1_uri skos:prefLabel ?detLevel1.
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?detLevel1), "en")).
FILTER(?det_uri=<http://data.europa.eu/uxp/det>)
}
} ORDER BY ?det ?detLevel1
askquery:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
ASK
where {{ ?det_uri skos:prefLabel ?det;
skos:hasTopConcept ?detLevel1_uri.
?detLevel1_uri skos:prefLabel ?detLevel1.
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?detLevel1), "en")).
FILTER(?det_uri=<http://data.europa.eu/uxp/det>)
}
}

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX authority: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/authority/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?country ?country_uri ?language ?language_uri
where {{?continentName_uri skos:prefLabel ?continentName;
skos:inScheme ?continent_uri.
?continent_uri skos:prefLabel ?continent.
?country_uri geo:sfWithin ?continentName_uri;
skos:prefLabel ?country;
authority:deprecated ?deprecated;
dcterms:language ?language_uri.
?language_uri skos:prefLabel ?language
}
filter(?country_uri=<PARAMETER>).
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?country), "en"))
filter(?deprecated="false").
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?language), "en"))
}ORDER BY?country ?language

option_text: Countries and organisations those countries belong to

query:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
   PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
    PREFIX geo: <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#>
    PREFIX geosparql: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
    PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
    PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            SELECT DISTINCT ?eurun ?eurun_uri ?eurun_image ?corporateBody ?corporateBody_uri ?corporateBody_image ?corporateBody_country ?corporateBody_countryUri ?corporateBody_location ?corporateBody_locationUri   
            where {{?eurun_uri org:hasSubOrganization ?corporateBody_uri;
                           skos:prefLabel ?eurun;
                           foaf:depiction ?eurun_image.
                    ?corporateBody_uri skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody;
                       foaf:depiction ?corporateBody_image;
                       geo:location ?corporateBody_locationUri.
                    ?corporateBody_locationUri skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody_location;
                              geosparql:sfWithin ?corporateBody_countryUri.
                    ?corporateBody_countryUri skos:prefLabel ?corporateBody_country          
                    } 
                   filter(?eurun_uri=<http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body/EURUN>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurun), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody_location), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?corporateBody_country), "en")).
                   }ORDER BY ?eurun ?corporateBody
                   #LIMIT 50
option_text: (update 20220421-1558: )This will list the European Union Institutions and bodies

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?directoryOrg ?membership ?directoryOrg_uri AS ?membership_directoryOrg
where {{?membership_uri org:organization ?directoryOrg_uri;
       euvoc:positionComplement ?membership.
       ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
       } 
    filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER>)
    FILTER(langMatches(lang(?membership), "en")).
    FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
    }GROUP BY ?membership

PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
            SELECT DISTINCT ?s ?article #?label
            where {{?s <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/P1186> 'PARAMETER2'.
                    ?article schema:about ?s .
                    ?article schema:inLanguage "en" .
                    ?article schema:isPartOf <https://en.wikipedia.org/> .
                    } 
                   }

PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
        PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
        PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
        SELECT DISTINCT ?opThemeParent ?opThemeParent_uri ?opThemeChild ?opThemeChild_uri
        where {{?opThemeChild_uri skos:broader ?opThemeParent_uri;
                   skos:prefLabel ?opThemeChild.
                ?opThemeParent_uri skos:prefLabel ?opThemeParent.
                } 
               filter(?opThemeParent_uri=<PARAMETER>)
               FILTER(langMatches(lang(?opThemeParent), "en")).
               FILTER(langMatches(lang(?opThemeChild), "en")).
               }ORDER BY ?opThemeParent ?opThemeChild
option_text: This is the long explanation for OP Themes children
This will show the list of publications of the corporate body

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
    PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>  
    PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  
    
            SELECT DISTINCT ?eurovocDomain ?eurovocDomain_uri ?directoryOrg_uri ?directoryOrg (?directoryOrg_uri AS ?eurovocDomain_directoryOrg)
            where {{?parlamentaryQuestion_uri cdm:question_parliamentary_asked_by_group_parliamentary ?directoryOrg_uri;
                            cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc/^skos:hasTopConcept/euvoc:domain ?eurovocDomain_uri.
                    ?expression cdm:expression_belongs_to_work ?parlamentaryQuestion_uri;
                    cdm:expression_uses_language ?expression_languageUri.
                    ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
                    ?eurovocDomain_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocDomain.
                    } 
                   filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocDomain), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
                   FILTER(str(?expression_languageUri)='http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG').
                   }
option: Eurovoc Domains classification for parlamentary questions
option_text: Eurovoc Domains classification for parlamentary questions

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
    PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>  
    PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  
    
            SELECT DISTINCT ?text
            where {{?parlamentaryQuestion_uri cdm:question_parliamentary_asked_by_group_parliamentary ?directoryOrg_uri;
                            cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc/^skos:hasTopConcept/euvoc:domain ?eurovocDomain_uri.
                            #cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc ?eurovoc_uri.
                            #cdm:resource_legal_id_celex ?parlamentaryQuestion;
                            #cdm:work_date_document ?parlamentaryQuestion_date.
                    ?expression cdm:expression_belongs_to_work ?parlamentaryQuestion_uri;
                    cdm:expression_uses_language ?expression_languageUri;
                    cdm:expression_title ?text.
                    ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
                    ?eurovocDomain_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocDomain.
                    } 
                   filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER2>).
                   filter(?eurovocDomain_uri=<PARAMETER>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocDomain), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
                   FILTER(str(?expression_languageUri)='http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG').
                   }
option: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Domain for parlamentary questions
option_text: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Domain for parlamentary questions

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
    PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>  
    PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  
    
            SELECT DISTINCT ?text
            where {{?parlamentaryQuestion_uri cdm:question_parliamentary_asked_by_group_parliamentary ?directoryOrg_uri;
                            cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc/^skos:hasTopConcept ?eurovocTop_uri.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri euvoc:domain ?eurovocDomain_uri.
                    ?expression cdm:expression_belongs_to_work ?parlamentaryQuestion_uri;
                    cdm:expression_uses_language ?expression_languageUri;
                    cdm:expression_title ?text.
                    ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocTop.
                    ?eurovocDomain_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocDomain.
                    } 
                   filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER2>).
                   filter(?eurovocDomain_uri=<PARAMETER>).
                   filter(?eurovocTop_uri=<PARAMETER3>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocTop), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocDomain), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
                   FILTER(str(?expression_languageUri)='http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG').
                   }
option: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Top Concepts for parlamentary questions
option_text: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Top Concepts for parlamentary questions

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
    PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>  
    PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  
    
            SELECT DISTINCT ?eurovocTop ?eurovocTop_uri (?directoryOrg_uri AS ?eurovocTop_directoryOrg) (?eurovocDomain_uri AS ?eurovocTop_eurovocDomain) ?eurovocDomain ?eurovocDomain_uri
            where {{?parlamentaryQuestion_uri cdm:question_parliamentary_asked_by_group_parliamentary ?directoryOrg_uri;
                            cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc/^skos:hasTopConcept ?eurovocTop_uri.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri euvoc:domain ?eurovocDomain_uri.
                    ?expression cdm:expression_belongs_to_work ?parlamentaryQuestion_uri;
                    cdm:expression_uses_language ?expression_languageUri.
                    ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocTop.
                    ?eurovocDomain_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocDomain.
                    } 
                   filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER2>).
                   filter(?eurovocDomain_uri=<PARAMETER>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocTop), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocDomain), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
                   FILTER(str(?expression_languageUri)='http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG').
                   }
option: Eurovoc Concepts by Eurovoc Domain for parlamentary questions
option_text: Eurovoc Concepts by Eurovoc Domain for parlamentary questions

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
    PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
    PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
    PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
    PREFIX euvoc: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/euvoc#>  
    PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>  
    
            SELECT DISTINCT ?text
            where {{?parlamentaryQuestion_uri cdm:question_parliamentary_asked_by_group_parliamentary ?directoryOrg_uri;
                            cdm:work_is_about_concept_eurovoc/^skos:hasTopConcept ?eurovocTop_uri.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri euvoc:domain ?eurovocDomain_uri.
                    ?expression cdm:expression_belongs_to_work ?parlamentaryQuestion_uri;
                    cdm:expression_uses_language ?expression_languageUri;
                    cdm:expression_title ?text.
                    ?directoryOrg_uri skos:prefLabel ?directoryOrg.
                    ?eurovocTop_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocTop.
                    ?eurovocDomain_uri skos:prefLabel ?eurovocDomain.
                    } 
                   filter(?directoryOrg_uri=<PARAMETER2>).
                   filter(?eurovocDomain_uri=<PARAMETER3>).
                   filter(?eurovocTop_uri=<PARAMETER>).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocTop), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?eurovocDomain), "en")).
                   FILTER(langMatches(lang(?directoryOrg), "en")).
                   FILTER(str(?expression_languageUri)='http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG').
                   }
option: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Top Concepts for parlamentary questions
option_text: Wordcloud by Eurovoc Top Concepts for parlamentary questions

query: SELECT ?prefLabel as ?text { ?eurovoc <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#prefLabel> ?prefLabel. FILTER(LANG(?prefLabel)='en') ?work <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#work_is_about_concept_eurovoc> ?eurovoc. optional{?eurovoc <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#broader> ?eurovoc.} ?work <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#work_authored_by_agent> <PARAMETER>}limit 9999

query:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX cdm: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX authority: <http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/authority/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?authorityTable ?authorityTable_uri ?continent ?continent_uri ?country ?country_uri
where {{?continent_uri skos:prefLabel ?continent;
skos:inScheme ?authorityTable_uri.
?authorityTable_uri skos:prefLabel ?authorityTable.
?country_uri geo:sfWithin ?continent_uri;
skos:prefLabel ?country;
authority:deprecated ?deprecated.
}
filter(?authorityTable_uri=<PARAMETER>).
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?continent), "en")).
filter(?deprecated="false").
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?country), "en"))
}ORDER BY ?authorityTable ?continent ?country

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX cdm:<http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
PREFIX dcterms:<http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT distinct ?country ?country_uri ?caseLawConcept ?caseLawConcept_uri (?country_uri AS ?caseLawConcept_country)
WHERE{{ 
    ?caseLaw_uri cdm:case-law_originates_in_country ?country_uri;
    cdm:case-law_is_about_concept_case-law ?caseLawConceptTemp_uri.
    ?caseLawConcept_uri skos:narrower* ?caseLawConceptTemp_uri. 
    ?caseLawConcept_uri skos:prefLabel ?caseLawConcept.
    ?country_uri skos:prefLabel ?country.
}
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?country), "en"))
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?caseLawConcept), "en"))
FILTER(?country_uri=<PARAMETER>).
FILTER EXISTS{?caseLawConcept_uri <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#topConceptOf> <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/fd_577>}.
}ORDER BY ?country ?caseLawConcept

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX cdm:<http://publications.europa.eu/ontology/cdm#>
PREFIX dcterms:<http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT distinct ?caseLawConceptParent ?caseLawConceptParent_uri ?caseLawConcept ?caseLawConcept_uri ?caseLawConcept_country
WHERE{{ 
    ?caseLaw_uri cdm:case-law_originates_in_country ?caseLawConcept_country;
    cdm:case-law_is_about_concept_case-law ?caseLawConceptTemp_uri.
    ?caseLawConcept_uri skos:narrower* ?caseLawConceptTemp_uri. 
    ?caseLawConcept_uri skos:prefLabel ?caseLawConcept.
    ?caseLawConceptParent_uri skos:prefLabel ?caseLawConceptParent.
}
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?caseLawConcept), "en"))
FILTER(langMatches(lang(?caseLawConceptParent), "en"))
FILTER(?caseLawConcept_country=<PARAMETER2>).
FILTER(?caseLawConceptParent_uri=<PARAMETER>).
FILTER EXISTS{?caseLawConceptParent_uri skos:narrower ?caseLawConcept_uri}.
}ORDER BY ?caseLawConceptParent ?caseLawConcept

option_text: Publications by Corporate body classified by this Eurovoc concept
